channel.title: oop on Paul Daniel Iway
channel.description: Recent content in oop on Paul Daniel Iway

item.title: Struggling with OOP
item.description: In a previous job interview, I’ve been asked a basic question about OOP: “What are the four pillars of OOP?“. It made me feel really bad about not being able to give an answer because I use these concepts everyday. The interview had also reminded me of how frustrating it felt to not understand the concept during my time in college. Those books where they tell you that a cat is an object didn’t help at all.
